original:
Opens a door to another dimension using its
holy sword, eliminating everything. 
★Death
translation:
Opens a door to another dimension using its
holy sword, eliminating everything. 
★Death

original:
An attack that launches numerous loving
hearts at the opponent, engulfing them in
happiness.
translation:
An attack that launches numerous loving
hearts at the opponent, engulfing them in
happiness.

original:
Passes judgement on the opponent by firing
light arrows that summons massive electrical
energy. ★Death
translation:
Passes judgement on the opponent by firing
light arrows that summons massive electrical
energy. ★Death

original:
Passes judgement upon the opponent by
shooting seven balls of light at them.
★Freeze
translation:
Passes judgement upon the opponent by
shooting seven balls of light at them.
★Freeze

original:
Unleashes infinity and engulfs everything in
neverending darkness. 
★Freeze ★Confusion
translation:
Unleashes infinity and engulfs everything in
neverending darkness. 
★Freeze ★Confusion

original:
Shreds the opponents soul with cold,
glittering dark crystals. 
★Confusion
translation:
Shreds the opponents soul with cold,
glittering dark crystals. 
★Confusion

original:
Absorbs the opponents data using the ray
gun in its left hand. 
★MP Drain ★Confusion
translation:
Absorbs the opponents data using the ray
gun in its left hand. 
★MP Drain ★Confusion

original:
Sings a sorrowful song, draining the
opponents will to fight.
translation:
Sings a sorrowful song, draining the
opponents will to fight.

original:
Combines its firey blade and shield to become
a giant sword, slashing the opponent.
translation:
Combines its firey blade and shield to become
a giant sword, slashing the opponent.

original:
Recklessly attacks the opponent with endless
flames of darkness. 
★Freeze ★Poison
translation:
Recklessly attacks the opponent with endless
flames of darkness. 
★Freeze ★Poison

original:
Fiercely attacks the opponent with its spear
and hammer made from energy.
translation:
Fiercely attacks the opponent with its spear
and hammer made from energy.

original:
Fires a powerful dark aura from its massive
wings.
translation:
Fires a powerful dark aura from its massive
wings.

original:
Unleashes a rainbow aura from its staff,
stealing away the opponents will to fight.
★Confusion
translation:
Unleashes a rainbow aura from its staff,
stealing away the opponents will to fight.
★Confusion

original:
Combines the power of fire with the power of
guardian lions into its fists in a single final
attack.
translation:
Combines the power of fire with the power of
guardian lions into its fists in a single final
attack.

original:
Burns the opponent with balls of energy as
hot as the sun.
translation:
Burns the opponent with balls of energy as
hot as the sun.

original:
Slashes the opponent with movements akin to
that of a graceful dance. 
★Confusion
translation:
Slashes the opponent with movements akin to
that of a graceful dance. 
★Confusion

original:
Bewitches and slashes the opponent with its
Harken embued with the moons mystical
energy. ★Confusion
translation:
Bewitches and slashes the opponent with its
Harken embued with the moons mystical
energy. ★Confusion

original:
An attack that wraps the opponent in its
mantle, embused with an aura of beauty and
love.
translation:
An attack that wraps the opponent in its
mantle, embused with an aura of beauty and
love.

original:
Transforms its arms into tentacles, embues
them with cursed energy, then slashes at the
opponent. ★Sleep
translation:
Transforms its arms into tentacles, embues
them with cursed energy, then slashes at the
opponent. ★Sleep

original:
A massivly powerful attack that results in
explosions that can distort dimensions.
translation:
A massivly powerful attack that results in
explosions that can distort dimensions.

original:
Swings its massive sword 'Olympia', 
slashing at the opponent.
translation:
Swings its massive sword 'Olympia', 
slashing at the opponent.

original:
Swings its sword, unleashing a powerful
shockwave of holy energy.
translation:
Swings its sword, unleashing a powerful
shockwave of holy energy.

original:
Unleashes a powerful beam of red-hot energy
from both eyes, burning everything.
translation:
Unleashes a powerful beam of red-hot energy
from both eyes, burning everything.

original:
Cleaves the opponent in two with a single
strike using the Ban-Tyo blade on its arm.
translation:
Cleaves the opponent in two with a single
strike using the Ban-Tyo blade on its arm.

original:
Calls upon the light of prayer to heal an allys
status and HP. 
★Freeze
translation:
Calls upon the light of prayer to heal an allys
status and HP. 
★Freeze

original:
Slashes the opponent with 
cat claws hidden in its fist. 
★Confusion
translation:
Slashes the opponent with 
cat claws hidden in its fist. 
★Confusion

original:
Slashes the opponent by throwing leaves like
Shuriken.
translation:
Slashes the opponent by throwing leaves like
Shuriken.

original:
Gathers holy energy, then launches a beam of
light at the opponent.
translation:
Gathers holy energy, then launches a beam of
light at the opponent.

original:
Summons a flaming meteor crashing down
upon the opponent.
translation:
Summons a flaming meteor crashing down
upon the opponent.

original:
Summons dragon-shaped flames from its tail
to attack.
translation:
Summons dragon-shaped flames from its tail
to attack.

original:
Slashes the opponent with sharp claws with
the force of a gust of wind.
translation:
Slashes the opponent with sharp claws with
the force of a gust of wind.

original:
Delivers a crushing blow by gathering holy
energy into its fist.
translation:
Delivers a crushing blow by gathering holy
energy into its fist.

original:
Engulfs its entire body in flames, flying high
into the sky, it crashes down on the
opponent.
translation:
Engulfs its entire body in flames, flying high
into the sky, it crashes down on the
opponent.

original: Fires balls of red hot fire at the opponent.
translation: Fires balls of red hot fire at the opponent.

original:
Head-butts the opponent with incredible
force using its rock-hard head.
translation:
Head-butts the opponent with incredible
force using its rock-hard head.

original:
Shoots two fireballs at the opponent, causing
an explosion.
translation:
Shoots two fireballs at the opponent, causing
an explosion.

original:
Shoots powerful fireballs at the opponent,
resulting in huge pillars of flames.
translation:
Shoots powerful fireballs at the opponent,
resulting in huge pillars of flames.

original:
Gathers electrical energy into its sharp blade
and slashes at the opponent.
translation:
Gathers electrical energy into its sharp blade
and slashes at the opponent.

original:
Summons a powerful tornado as if it were
God's breath, blowing the opponent away.
translation:
Summons a powerful tornado as if it were
God's breath, blowing the opponent away.

original:
Burns the opponent with a powerful lazer
beam fired from the X-mark on its body.
translation:
Burns the opponent with a powerful lazer
beam fired from the X-mark on its body.

original:
Fires red-hot balls of energy from its mouth
at the opponent.
translation:
Fires red-hot balls of energy from its mouth
at the opponent.

original:
Fires massive balls of fire at the opponent,
resulting in firey explosions.
translation:
Fires massive balls of fire at the opponent,
resulting in firey explosions.

original: Ferociously shoots water at the opponent.
translation: Ferociously shoots water at the opponent.

original:
Slashes at the opponent with its scissors
embued with the power of water.
translation:
Slashes at the opponent with its scissors
embued with the power of water.

original:
Gathers sub-zero ice power into its fist and
punches the opponent.
translation:
Gathers sub-zero ice power into its fist and
punches the opponent.

original:
Summons two sub-zero ice tornadoes to
engulf the opponent.
translation:
Summons two sub-zero ice tornadoes to
engulf the opponent.

original:
Fires balls of ink embued with 
poison at the opponent. 
★Poison
translation:
Fires balls of ink embued with 
poison at the opponent. 
★Poison

original:
Slashes the opponent with discs rotating at
high Speed. 
★Freeze ★Confusion
translation:
Slashes the opponent with discs rotating at
high Speed. 
★Freeze ★Confusion

original:
Uses its horn as a missile, which it fires to
attack.
translation:
Uses its horn as a missile, which it fires to
attack.

original:
Launches the blades all over its body,
slashing the opponent to ribbons. 
★HP Drain
translation:
Launches the blades all over its body,
slashing the opponent to ribbons. 
★HP Drain
